content: क्षेत्रं [क्षि-ष्ट्रन्] {@--1@} A field, ground, soil; चीयते बालिशस्यापि सत्क्षेत्रपतिता कृषिः <ls>Mu. 1. 3.</ls> {@--2@} Landed property, land. {@--3@} Place, abode, region, repository; कपटशतमयं क्षेत्रमप्रत्ययानां <ls>Pt. 1. 191</ls>; <ls>Bh. 1. 77</ls>; <ls>Me. 16.</ls> {@--4@} A sacred spot, a place of pilgrimage; क्षेत्रं क्षत्रप्रधनपिशुनं कौरवं तद्भजेथाः <ls>Me. 48</ls>; <ls>Bg. 1. 1.</ls> {@--5@} An enclosed spot of ground, portion of space, superficies, circuit. {@--6@} Fertile soil. {@--7@} Place of origin. {@--8@} A wife; अपि नाम कुलपतेरियमसवर्णक्षेत्रसंभवा स्यात् <ls>Ś. 1</ls>; <ls>Ms. 3. 175.</ls> {@--9@} The sphere of action, the body (regarded as the field of the working of the soul); योगिनो यं विचिन्वंति क्षेत्राभ्यंतरवर्तिनं <ls>Ku. 6. 77</ls>; <ls>Bg. 13. 1</ls>, <ls n="Bg. 13.">2</ls>, <ls n="Bg. 13.">3.</ls> {@--10@} The mind. {@--11@} A house; a town. {@--12@} A plane figure, as a triangle. {@--13@} A diagram. {@--14@} A sign of the zodiac.
